document.discussion_title: SPEAK UP: Female entrepreneurs face challenges, but solutions exist
document.topic_text: SPEAK UP: Female entrepreneurs face challenges, but solutions exist Monday, April 25, 2016 8:00 AM The number of women-owned businesses is growing, but women continue to face hurdles such as resume gaps and a lack of capital, writes Rita Cheng, CEO of Blue Ocean Global Wealth. A strong business plan can help women overcome many challenges, she adds. Cheng recommends finding alternative funding sources and using networking resources such as NAWBO. Read more

A strong business plan can help women overcome many challenges, she adds. Cheng recommends finding alternative funding sources and using networking resources such as NAWBO. Read more
